language.title: Select which language you want Rise to be in

theme.title: You can click on a color to filter by it. Click again to reset.

click_gui.name: Click GUI
click_gui.description: Displays a GUI that allows you to toggle modules and edit their settings

interface.name: Interface
interface.description: The clients interface with all information

fling.name: Fling
fling.description: Launches player to the abyss upon impact

teleport_walk.name: Teleport Walk
teleport_walk.description: Teleports you to your moving direction

flight.name: Flight
flight.description: Grants you the ability to fly

tptofinishtoh.name: Teleport to Finish
tptofinishtoh.description: Teleports your character to the win location

bssmondo.name: Mondo Chick Notifier
bssmondo.description: Notifies you in Chat and Notification when Mondo Chick spawns
